PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09612018-06-28, 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectUnited States Surtax Order (Steel and Aluminum)
PrecisUNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (STEEL AND ALUMINUM) in order to encourage a prompt end to United States tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum exports to the U.S., which significantly impact Canada’s steel and aluminum industries and threaten to undermine the integrity of the global trading system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0152 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: United States Surtax Order (Steel and Aluminum)
